ProductInfo.Features:
LCD-LED Screen : 55-inch diagonal TFT Active Matrix, LED Backlight ; Resolution : 1920 x 1080 full-HD 1080p ; Aspect Ratio : 16:9
Contrast Ratio : 1300:1 ; Frame Rate : 120Hz ; Viewing Angle : 176 °x 176 ° ; Response Time : 12 milliseconds ; TV formats : 1080p, 1080i, 720p, 480p, 480i
RF : Antenna/CATV (ATSC/QAM/NTSC) x1 ; HDMI : HDMITM Input x2 ; Video Composite : S-Video x1 and Composite Video x1, L/R Audio Inputs x1 ; Video Component : YPbPr plus Stereo Audio x2
PC : 15-pin D-sub VGA plus Stereo Audio ; Control Set : RS232 Serial, Discrete IR Control, Concealed IR Window ; Audio Out : SPDIF, Analog 1/8" Headphone Jack
Speakers : 20 WATT Built-In Speakers ; Input Power : 100-240 VAC, 50-60 Hz 2.0 A Max ; Operating Temp : -24° to 122° F. (-31° to 50°C.)
ProductInfo.Name: Sunbrite SB-5565HD-WH Pro Series 55" Class 1080P LED/LCD All-Weather TV (White)
